Formula.Hint: Fallback dice formula used to convert stress (useful for homebrew macros).
Formula.Name: Stress Conversion Formula

MinStressConversion.Hint: If enabled, stress conversion is capped at 0 instead of minimum stress.
MinStressConversion.Name: Convert Minimum Stress

NoSanitySave.Hint: If enabled, stress will be converted without a sanity save.
NoSanitySave.Name: No Sanity Save

NoStressRelieve.Hint: If enabled, stress will not be reset to minimum after stress conversion.
NoStressRelieve.Name: No Stress Relieve

EnableCharacterCreator.Hint: If enabled, replaces the old character creation macro with the new QoL version.
EnableCharacterCreator.Name: Enable QoL Character Creator

EnableShipCrits.Hint: If enabled, ship crit button appears and the 0e crit logic activates.
EnableShipCrits.Name: Enable 0e Ship Crits

ShoreLeaveEditor.Hint: Customize the tiers used in the simple shore leave system.
ShoreLeaveEditor.Label: Edit Shore Leave...
ShoreLeaveEditor.Name: Edit Shore Leave Tiers

DisableFlavor.Hint: Disable the randomized flavor of shore leave activities.
DisableFlavor.Name: Disable shore leave flavor

RandomFlavor.Hint: Enhance simple shore leave with random, flavored activities.
RandomFlavor.Name: Flavored shore leave activities

ThemeColor.Hint: If set, this will override the player colors.
ThemeColor.Name: Global Theme Color

ThemeColorOverride.Hint: If set, this will override the default color for this user.
ThemeColorOverride.Name: Player Theme Color

Editor.Description: Edit stress conversion and pricing formulas for each shore leave tier.
Editor.ResetSuccess: Shore Leave tiers reset to defaults.
Editor.Title: Shore Leave Tier Configuration

ShoreLeave.NoActorForStressConversion: No actor available for stress conversion.
ShoreLeave.Title: Shore Leave

AlreadyCompleted.Content:
{actorName} has already completed character creation.
Do you want to reset and start over?
AlreadyCompleted.Title: Character Already Completed

Warning.NoValidData: No valid character creator data found for {actorName}!
Warning.OverwriteRisk: Proceeding might overwrite an existing character.
Warning.Title: Character Creator: Warning

Notifications.MarkedCompleted: {actorName} has been marked as completed manually.
Notifications.NoClassUuid: No class UUID found. Please select a class.
Notifications.Reset: Character creation for {actorName} has been reset.

SelectAttributes.MustSelectOnePerSet: You must select one attribute per set.
SelectAttributes.Title: Select Attributes

SelectSkills.DependencyNeedsSkill: {skillName} needs this skill to remain selected.
SelectSkills.Title: Select Skills
